sqlMap.select: SELECT S.SCREEN_CODE , M.MOVIE_CODE , M.NAME MOVIE_NAME , C.LOC , C.NAME CINEMA_NAME , TH.THEATER_CODE , TH.NAME TH_NAME , S.START_DATE , S.END_DATE FROM SCREEN S INNER JOIN MOVIE M ON S.MOVIE_CODE = M.MOVIE_CODE INNER JOIN THEATER TH ON S.THEATER_CODE = TH.THEATER_CODE INNER JOIN CINEMA C ON TH.CINEMA_CODE = C.CINEMA_CODE ORDER BY M.NAME, TH.NAME
SELECT MOVIE_CODE FROM MOVIE WHERE NAME = #movie_title#
SELECT THEATER_CODE FROM THEATER TH INNER JOIN CINEMA C ON TH.CINEMA_CODE = C.CINEMA_CODE WHERE TH.NAME = #theater_name# and C.NAME = #cinema_name#
SELECT SCREEN_SCH_CODE , SCREEN_DATE , START_TIME , END_TIME , SCREEN_NUM , MOVIE_CODE , THEATER_CODE FROM SCREEN_SCH WHERE SCREEN_CODE = #screen_code# ORDER BY SCREEN_DATE DESC
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT SCREEN_CODE_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS SCREEN_CODE FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO SCREEN(SCREEN_CODE, MOVIE_CODE, THEATER_CODE, START_DATE, END_DATE) VALUES('SCREEN' || SCREEN_CODE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #movie_code#, #theater_code#, #start_date#, #end_date#)

INSERT INTO SCREEN_SCH(SCREEN_SCH_CODE , SCREEN_DATE , START_TIME , END_TIME , SCREEN_NUM , MOVIE_CODE , THEATER_CODE , SCREEN_CODE) VALUES(#screen_sch_code# , #screen_date# , #start_time# , #end_time# , #screen_num# , #movie_code# , #theater_code# , #screen_code#)
